data.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
data.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: ProgressNEXT 2020
relatedRecords.description: Join us in Boston, June 2020, to learn, connect with leaders and visionaries and thrive in a digital world. ProgressNEXT is the premier event for modern application development.

relatedRecords.name: Into The Box 2020
relatedRecords.description: Into the Box is a yearly web technologies and software craftsmanship conference. We welcome you this May 1st to the 3rd, 2019 in Houston, Texas!

relatedRecords.name: Modesto-Berkeley DevFest 2019
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…
